item.description:
UPDATE (Aug 6th at 9:30AM): Well, folks, it's looking worse for tonight.

There's a 30-50% chance of thunderstorms for this afternoon and evening, and reports from the Pittsfield area are that it's looking like it's threatening rain already this morning.

I'm going to leave this meetup open in case any of you do go up and want to report to others what the conditions are like. Since I was planning on tenting it, I won't be heading up - I'm past the stage in life where tenting in a thunderstorm or waking to pouring rain is considered an adventure.

In August the CAPE and Seacoast Groups will visit Pittsfield, NH for the 30th Annual Pittsfield NH Hot Air Balloon Rally 2011. This is a smaller festival, they are expecting around 20 balloons. This should be a great venue in which to shoot. 

CAPE Group organizers are heading up the night before. We'll plan to meet around 7p.m. on Saturday night for the balloon glow and fireworks. On Sunday morning we'll meet again around 4:30a.m. for the farewell lift off. For those interested in staying over Saturday night there are hotels nearby in Concord, NH.

CAPE Group Meetup Details:

When:
Saturday, August 6, 2011 at 7:00p.m.
AND
Sunday, August 7, 2011 at 4:30 a.m.

Where: Drake Field Pittsfield New Hampshire near the hot air balloon area. (I'll send out my cell number to those attending closer to the date.)

 

 

Information from the Pittsfield Rotary:

LOCATION:
Drake Field Pittsfield New Hampshire
GPS Location for Drake Field in Pittsfield NH: N43° 18.430' - W071° 19.403'

FEES:
Entrance: FREE ($5.00 suggested donation)
Parking: FREE
Shuttles between parking lots and field: $1/Person (Each Ride)
Food, Beverages, Carnival Amusements, Helicopter Rides, & Tethered Hot Air Balloon Rides all have separate charges.

RULES:
No Smoking, No Pets (due to food being served). Bags, coolers, backpacks and other containers except for childcare and medical needs are not allowed. No: cans, glass, alcohol, skateboards, bikes or weapons. are allowed. All bags subject to inspection.

Hot Air Balloon Launch Schedule:
Saturday: 5:30 – 6:00 am Dawn Hot Air Balloon Liftoff
Saturday: 5:00 – 6:00 pm Afternoon Hot Air Balloon Liftoff
Saturday: 8:30 pm Night Glow (Hot Air Balloons Light Up On Ground, No Launch)
Sunday: 5:30 – 6:00 am Dawn Farewell Mass Ascension Balloon Liftoff

Fireworks:
Saturday: At Dusk
item.name: 30th Annual Pittsfield NH Hot Air Balloon Rally 2011
